name: Fast Baseball
description:
Welcome to Fast Baseball!  There's no waiting around for plays.  Hit the balls pitched from our never ceaseing pitching machine.  Don't just load the bases. Load the whole diamond.

Pitches come at varying speeds. And there will be some balls you can't hit.  Game lasts one inning.

We love you!  

Controls
Space / right face button on gamepad: Confirm/Swing

Credits:
Game by Max Morse
Fonts by Brakeys
